lead_paragraph: A Navy commander accused of diverting ships to Asian ports for a Malaysian contractor in exchange for prostitution services and other gifts pleaded guilty to bribery charges on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: California: Guilty Plea by Navy Officer
headline.main: California: Guilty Plea by Navy Officer

snippet: A Navy commander accused of diverting ships to Asian ports for a Malaysian contractor in exchange for prostitution services and other gifts pleaded guilty to bribery charges on Thursday.
abstract: Michael Misiewicz, Navy officer accused of accepting bribes in exchange for favors to Malaysian contractor Glenn Defense Marine Asia Ltd, pleads guilty; Misieqicz is eighth person convicted in scandal, which centers on businessman Leonard Francis.
